text: Sigmundur Davíð Gunnlaugsson (; born 12 March 1975) is an Icelandic politician. He was the Prime Minister of Iceland from 23 May 2013 through 5 April 2016. He has been chairman of the Progressive Party since 2009. He resigned on 5 April 2016 as a result of the Panama Papers leak. Sigmundur Davíð was born in Reykjavík. He is married to Anna Sigurlaug Pálsdóttir. They have a child together. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Reykjavík Category:Prime ministers of Iceland
title: Sigmundur Davíð Gunnlaugsson
